name: Ruby Ooze
description: A deceptive ooze that resembles a pile of rubies when motionless, the Ruby Ooze can squeeze through tight spaces and strikes with corrosive damage.
memorable: Its ability to camouflage as gems and petrify its foes makes the Ruby Ooze uniquely dangerous.
goals: To ambush and overwhelm unsuspecting adventurers using surprise and corrosive attacks.
relations: Related to other hazardous oozes or creatures that control or manipulate the environment.
environment: Often found in treasure-filled caverns or areas rich in precious gems.
strengths: Superior ambush tactics, high hit points, corrosive attacks that degrade weaponry.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to lightning damage and struggles against ranged attacks due to low Dexterity.
attacks: Dual pseudopod attacks dealing significant bludgeoning and acid damage, and a powerful Acid Spray that can restrain foes.
most_powerful_ability: The Acid Spray can turn opponents' flesh into stone while dealing significant damage.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, making it aware of creatures even in complete darkness.
additional_information: Can squeeze through a space as narrow as 1 inch.
Weapons striking it suffer cumulative damage penalties.
Can climb difficult surfaces without hindrance.
